select a.id as id, a.subject_id as subjectId, ast.subject_title as subjectTitle, a.article_name as articleName, a.article_content as articleContent, f.file_path as filePath, a.article_look_count as articleLookCount, a.article_love_count as articleLoveCount, a.article_support_count as articleSupportCount, a.article_comment_count as articleCommentCount, a.create_time as createTime, a.create_user as createUser, u.user_name as createUserName, fu.file_path as userIconPath from article as a left join user as u on a.create_user = u.id left join files as f on a.article_icon_id = f.id left join files as fu on u.user_icon_id = fu.id left join article_subject as ast on a.subject_id = ast.id where a.status = "1" order by a.create_time desc
limit ${limit},${offset}

select a.id as id, a.subject_id as subjectId, a.article_name as articleName, a.article_content as articleContent, f.file_path as filePath, a.article_look_count as articleLookCount, a.article_love_count as articleLoveCount, a.article_support_count as articleSupportCount, a.article_comment_count as articleCommentCount, a.create_time as createTime, a.create_user as createUser, u.user_name as createUserName, fu.file_path as userIconPath from article as a left join user as u on a.create_user = u.id left join files as f on a.article_icon_id = f.id left join files as fu on u.user_icon_id = fu.id where a.status = "1" and a.id = #{id}

select a.id as id, a.subject_id as subjectId, a.article_name as articleName, a.article_content as articleContent, f.file_path as filePath, a.article_look_count as articleLookCount, a.article_love_count as articleLoveCount, a.article_support_count as articleSupportCount, a.article_comment_count as articleCommentCount, a.create_time as createTime, a.create_user as createUser, u.user_name as createUserName, fu.file_path as userIconPath from article as a left join user as u on a.create_user = u.id left join files as f on a.article_icon_id = f.id left join files as fu on u.user_icon_id = fu.id where a.status = "1" and a.subject_id = #{subjectId} order by a.create_time desc
limit ${limit},${offset}

select a.create_user as createUser, u.user_name as createUserName, fu.file_path as userIconPath from article as a left join user as u on a.create_user = u.id left join files as fu on u.user_icon_id = fu.id where a.status = "1" and a.subject_id = #{subjectId} group by a.create_user limit ${limit},${offset}
select count(*) from article where status = "1" and create_user = #{userId}
select count(*) from article where status = "1"
select count(*) from article where status = "1" and subject_id = #{subjectId}

select ars.id as id, a.article_name as articleName, a.article_content as articleContent, f.file_path as filePath, ars.create_time as createTime, ars.create_user as createUser, u.user_name as createUserName, fu.file_path as userIconPath, ars.request_subject_id as requestSubjectId, ars.request_article_id as requestArticleId, ast.subject_title as requestSubjectTitle from article_request_submit as ars left join article as a on ars.request_article_id = a.id left join user as u on a.create_user = u.id left join files as f on a.article_icon_id = f.id left join files as fu on u.user_icon_id = fu.id left join article_subject as ast on ars.request_subject_id = ast.id where ars.status = "1" and ars.request_subject_create_user_id = #{userId}
